description:
Elevate your outdoor run or hike ensemble with the Traverse High-Rise Cold Weather Legging. Crafted with the utmost care for both your comfort and the environment, these leggings offer a perfect blend of fashion and functionality. Here's why they're the perfect companion for your active lifestyle.

  • Cozy fabric treatment keeps you warm when the temperature drops
  • Reflectivity helps you remain visible during low-light conditions
  • Customize the fit with the adjustable drawcord at the waistband
  • Side pockets conveniently store your essentials on the go
  • Certified B Corporation: certified to meet the highest standards of social and environmental impact
name: MPG Traverse High-Rise Cold Weather Legging - Women's
